::KitKat::

She looked at Drillbit.  She really wanted to be with him, but now, 
she had to deal with business.  

"Please Drillbit.  I need you to get our two now recruits some 
quarters.  Thank you."  She kissed his cheek and turned to Phobia.

"Phobia, I need to ask you if we may have use of your ship.  Your 
ship is powerfull enough to cripple the maximals in a major way.  
When Megatron get's back, I want to be able to tell him that we may 
count on you and your ship to get revenge on the maximals.  I.."she 
looked down.  "I owe it to a friend.  I can hear her spark cring our 
for revenge. I need to be able to crush them.  Please Phobia."

She closed her eyes and saw her shot strike Land Mine in the head and 
cause her death.  Her face showed pain and remorse and she relived 
that moment when she took her friends life to save her from torture 
and more suffering.  She opened her eyes and looked at Phobia.  A 
single tear rolled down her cheek.  Her eyes begged for the use of 
the ship.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Your looking for Deemos? Him and his group attacked this base three
> times, in the last two days. All the damage you see is his fault. 
And we
> lost two Predicons, to them." He said, to the new bot. DrillBit 
observed
> KitKat and Phobia. He knew that KitKat needed her space, especially 
now
> that she was second in command, but something made him want to see 
what
> they were talking about. He walked up, to them.
> "Whats going on?" He asked.
